title: Verify Order Confirmation Email Notification
objective: To verify that customers receive order confirmation emails with correct information
preconditions: Test user has valid email address
User has not opted out of transactional emails

test_steps.action: Complete a test order as customer
test_steps.expected_result: Order placed successfully, order confirmation page displayed

test_steps.action: Verify email subject line: 'Order Confirmation - #[Order Number]'
Verify email body contains: Order number, Order date, Items with quantities and prices, Shipping address, Payment method (last 4 digits only), Order total, Estimated delivery date
test_steps.expected_result: All order details present and accurate

test_steps.action: Verify email contains 'Track Your Order' link

test_steps.expected_result: Link opens to order details page with correct order loaded

test_steps.action: Verify email footer contains: Company contact information, Unsubscribe link (for marketing), Privacy policy link, Social media links
test_steps.expected_result: Footer complete with all required elements

test_steps.action: Verify email formatting is responsive (view on mobile)
test_steps.expected_result: Email displays correctly on mobile devices

test_steps.action: Verify no sensitive information exposed (full card number, CVV, password)
test_steps.expected_result: Only last 4 digits of payment method shown

test_execution_history.notes: Email received in 45 seconds, all information correct

notes: Test across different email clients: Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail. Verify spam filtering.
